expertise.name: Java
expertise.fullDescription: I have studied Java in multiple schools and have a solid understanding of the fundamentals. It's my goto language for larger object oriented programs currently.

expertise.name: React
expertise.fullDescription: We tried React for a frontend group assignment and since React has been my go-to framework for frontend.

expertise.name: Python
expertise.shortDescription: For smaller personal projects and scripts
expertise.fullDescription: Python is the language I choose for creating smaller applications and scripts for personal use. I don't pay as much attention to safety and scaleability since I use it mainly for myself and in smaller scale.

expertise.name: HTML
expertise.shortDescription: Can build and structure standard sites
expertise.fullDescription: I am familiar with and can use the standard building blocks of a site. I can strucutre a decent site correctly with containers, and implement links and forms.

expertise.name: Kotlin
expertise.shortDescription: Know basic of kotlin and functional programming
expertise.fullDescription: I've done a single course of functional programming where we used kotlin as the chosen language. I found it was a smooth transition from Java to kotlin and I ended up really enjoying the simplicity of the language.

expertise.name: C
expertise.fullDescription: I took CS50 which is a computer science course online that used C as a vessel to teach computer science. I have not worked anything in C after that.

expertise.name: C#
expertise.shortDescription: Used C# for school for a year.
expertise.fullDescription: I've done a year of C# but I'm currently a little rusty. Since it's so similar to Java I could transfer that knowledge with ease. I also created some  smaller .NET projects that use C#.

expertise.name: Object-oriented programming
expertise.fullDescription: I have a good understanding of working with objects, classes and inheritence. I also have a basic understanding of interfaces.

expertise.name: Functional Programming
expertise.fullDescription: I have basic knowledge of Java streams and C# LINQ. I know most of the standard functions like maps, filters and sorting.

expertise.name: Design Patterns
expertise.shortDescription: I have dabbled in design patterns
expertise.fullDescription: I know about some very basic patterns like factory, singleton and visitor patterns, but I don't have alot of experience of implementing them.

expertise.name: GIT
expertise.shortDescription: I use GIT for most things nowadays
expertise.fullDescription: We've done many group projects that are coordinated with GIT, and I know how to use branches, push and pull and validate others pulls. With that said we've also cheated alot and I might lack some work experience in larger teams.

expertise.name: MySQL
expertise.fullDescription: I have experience with simpler databases and how to query them. Nothing bigger than 10 connected tables.

expertise.name: AI
expertise.shortDescription: Know how to use and not to use AI
expertise.fullDescription: I have been a avid user of ChatGPT since it first broke out and I have a good understanding on how to use it without relying on it.

expertise.name: CSS
expertise.shortDescription: I can understand and edit basic css
expertise.fullDescription: I am good at understanding and making smaller changes to existing css files but I'm not that good at designing myself. For basic stuff I can probably google or AI some good designs.

expertise.name: JSON
expertise.shortDescription: I can add and parse JSON data
expertise.fullDescription: These very cards are stored as JSON data that I have created an editor for in python. I might struggle with larger JSON files but I know the basic structures of them.

expertise.name: Trello
expertise.shortDescription: Used trello to manage group projects
expertise.fullDescription: We've used trello to manage group project. I have also used trello to plan out and performe agile developments divided up in sprints.

expertise.name: Figma
expertise.shortDescription: Can create simple prototypes to showcase apps
expertise.fullDescription: Have worked on smaller prototypes for websites and mobile applications, to easier design the real application.
